html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-03871998-03-190,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ÉRIC LEMIEUX, of Ste-Foy, Quebec, as Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Beverly-Ann Scott, whose term has expired.
Attachments
precis:
Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of
ÉRIC LEMIEUX, of Ste-Foy, Quebec, as Vice-Chairperson of the Board of
Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office
during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of
Beverly-Ann Scott, whose term has expired.
